lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Pl sY ibrK ibrKu sY hoq Pl; AiqBuiq giq kCu khn n AwvY jI [

Unknown.translation: Just as a seed of the fruit gives a tree and the tree yields the same fruit; this strange phenomena hardly comes into any say or conversation,

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ Pl qoˆ ibrC qy ibrC qoˆ Pl huMdw hY ies AdBuq vrqwry dI gqI kuC AwKI nhIˆ jw skdI[ ipAwirE!

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bwsu bwvn mY bwvn hY bwsu ibKY; ibsm cirqR koaU mrmu n pwvY jI [

Unknown.translation: Just as fragrance resides in sandalwood and sandalwood lives in its fragrance, none can know the deep and wonderful secret of this phenomena,

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ bwsnw bwvn cMnx AMdr qy cMnx huMdw hY bwsu sugMDI ivKy eys, Acrj cliqR dw mrmu gUVH Byq koeI nhIˆ pw skdw jI!

lines.gurmukhi: kwsit mY Agin Agin mY kwsit hY; Aiq Ascrju hY kauqk khwvY jI [

Unknown.translation: Just as wood houses fire and fire has wood burning in it; it is a marvellous phenomena. It is also called a strange spectacle.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: jIkUM kwT ivc A`g huMdI hY, qy AgnI ivc kwT Aru ieh kauqk cilqR BI AqÎMq Acrj srUp AwKÎw jwˆdw hY jI!

lines.gurmukhi: siqgur mY sbd sbd mY siqgur hY; inrgun igAwn iDAwn smJwvY jI [534[

Unknown.translation: Similarly the name of the Lord resides in True Guru and True Guru resides in His (Lord) name. He alone can understand this mystery of the Absolute God who has obtained knowledge from True Guru and who meditates on Him.  (534)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqsy qrHwˆ siqgurwˆ ivc Sbd BrpUr hY qy Sbd ivKy siqgurU rmy hoey hn ieh rmz AYsI hY ik ies igAwn qoˆ inrgux srUp dy iDAwn dI smJ Aw jwˆdI hY jI AMdr ]534]
